articles.author: Aaron Pellish
articles.title: Trump threatens to primary Indiana Republicans ahead of key redistricting vote - Politico
articles.description: The Indiana Senate will vote on a new map on Thursday that could create two new GOP-leaning House seats.
articles.content: His threat reflects the stakes for his presidency if the Democrats retake the House, which would allow them to thwart his agenda and launch investigations of his administration. Trump has sought to p… [+2372 chars]

articles.author: Jill Martin
articles.title: ‘Dadgummit, let’s freaking go’ – Philip Rivers returns to the NFL with Colts - CNN
articles.description: “I had not given any thought of playing again until about 48 hours ago, to be honest with you,” a candid Philip Rivers said while standing in front a group of reporters at the Indianapolis Colts facility.
